title: IT services : Major vendors , by revenue per employee
yAxis: Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing It Services Vendor in the x axis and Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
It Services Vendor IBM has the highest Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars and TCS has the lowest Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars.
The Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars of It Services Vendor IBM is 7.96% larger than the minimum value at TCS.
